law.text:
As used in KRS 156.660 to 156.670 and KRS 168.015, unless the context indicates otherwise:
"Council" means the Council for Education Technology.
"Technology" includes, but is not limited to, computers, telecommunications, cable television, interactive video, film, low-power television, satellite communications, and microwave communications.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. 1, sec. 19, effective July 13, 1990.
